Subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Being pushed away by Killfest, Motormaster barely avoids the fireball. but
it dosent avoid his notice. He looks down at Endbringer who is engaged with
the energy absorbing Maximal, "Cover me" he shouts to Killfest, as he heads
down to Koj. As he reaches him he spits "Absorb this" and puts his fists
together for a double ax handle, aiming for the robots head.
